attributes.action: set up an independent body to investigate and charge (where applicable) MPs with the fraudulent use of expenses from the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be investigated over the blatant and fraudulent abuse of expenses available to them.  Joe Bloggs on the street would have been charged with fraud by now, what makes MPs exempt from the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
